meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Jordan Skidmore Danielle Phillip Jonathan Dinerstein Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7898.

td.p: Jordan Skidmore, a chef from Dublin, California
Danielle Phillip, an attorney from Ann Arbor, Michigan
Jonathan Dinerstein, a composer from Los Angeles, California (whose 1-day cash winnings total $16,500)

tr.td: ONE-WORD MOVIE TITLES
IN THEIR WILLS
BUILDING AN IDIOM
(Alex: Each correct response will contain a structure or a dwelling.)
CHARACTER MASHUPS
(Alex: We want you to identify the characters we have mashed up together.)
COUNT
YOUR BLESSINGS

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
